Title: Relates to technical assistance provided to municipalities related to college and university closures; repealer
Summary: Directs the department of economic development to provide certain assistance to municipalities in which a college or university has closed.
LawCode: Rpld ยง153, Exec L (as proposed in S.1525 & A.2007); add ยง12, Ec Dev L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the economic development law, in relation to technical assistance provided to municipalities related to college and university closures; and to repeal section 153 of the executive law, in relation thereto
